data.title: iPad: What devices are compatible with Clip Studio Paint?
data.meta_description:
Clip Studio Paint can be used on the following iPad devices.
The following devices have been added:
iPad Pro 13‑in. (M4)iPad Pro 11‑in. (M4)iPad Air 1
data.text:
Clip Studio Paint can be used on the following iPad devices.

Update (5/15/2024)

The following devices have been added:

iPad Pro 13‑in. (M4)

iPad Pro 11‑in. (M4)

iPad Air 13‑in. (M2)

iPad Air 11‑in. (M2)

For high resolution illustrations, comics, etc.

iPad Pro 13‑in. (M4) added May 15, 2024

iPad Pro 11‑in. (M4) added May 15, 2024

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (6th generation)

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (5th generation)

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (4th generation)

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (3rd generation) *1TB model

iPad Pro 11‑in. (4th generation)

iPad Pro 11‑in. (3rd generation)

iPad Pro 11‑in. (2nd generation)

iPad Pro 11‑in. (1st generation) *1TB model

iPad Air 13‑in. (M2) added May 15, 2024

iPad Air 11‑in. (M2) added May 15, 2024

iPad Air (5th generation)

For standard size illustrations, webcomics, etc.

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (3rd generation)

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (2nd generation)

iPad Pro 12.9‑in. (1st generation)

iPad Pro 11‑in. (1st generation)

iPad Pro 10.5‑in.

iPad (10th generation)

iPad (9th generation)

iPad (8th generation)

iPad (7th generation)

iPad mini (6th generation)

iPad mini (5th generation)

iPad Air (4th generation)

iPad Air (3rd generation)

Recommended Environment

iPadOS 16 / iPadOS 17

3GB or more of memory required, 4GB or more recommended

6GB or more memory is recommended when creating high-resolution illustrations, comics, etc.

10.5 inches or larger display recommended

At least 6GB of free storage space

People who read this FAQ also viewed FAQ like this.
